chart.title: Direct economic loss attributed to disasters
chart.subtitle: The monetary value per year of total or partial destruction of physical assets existing in the affected area. Direct economic loss is nearly equivalent to physical damage. This data is in current US$ and not adjusted for inflation
chart.citation: UN Office for Disaster Risk Reduction
